StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetRecruitersShell]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@Organiza.onID as integer, @Recrui.ngPersonID as integer AS
SET NOCOUNT ON
--- Create a temp table of the current OSO assigned to the candidate SELECT RP.RECRUITING_PERSON_ID, CASE WHEN RP.RANK_CODE IS NOT NULL AND P.LAST_NAME IS NOT NULL AND P.FIRST_NAME IS NOT NULL AND P.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME IS NOT NULL THEN LTRIM(RTRIM(RP.RANK_CODE)) + ' ' + LTRIM(RTRIM(P.LAST_NAME)) + ' ' + LTRIM(RTRIM(P.FIRST_NAME)) + ' ' + LTRIM(RTRIM(P.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME)) WHEN RP.RANK_CODE IS NOT NULL AND P.LAST_NAME IS NOT NULL AND P.FIRST_NAME IS NOT NULL AND P.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME IS NULL THEN LTRIM(RTRIM(RP.RANK_CODE)) + ' ' + LTRIM(RTRIM(P.LAST_NAME)) + ' ' + LTRIM(RTRIM(P.FIRST_NAME)) WHEN RP.RANK_CODE IS NOT NULL AND P.LAST_NAME IS NOT NULL AND P.FIRST_NAME IS NULL THEN LTRIM(RTRIM(RP.RANK_CODE)) + ' ' + LTRIM(RTRIM(P.LAST_NAME)) ELSE LTRIM(RTRIM(RP.RANK_CODE)) END AS NAME INTO #TEMP_RP FROM RECRUITING_PERSON RP INNER JOIN PERSON P ON (RP.RECRUITING_PERSON_ID = P.PERSON_ID AND P.PERSON_ID = @Recrui.ngPersonID)
--- Union the current OSO with a list of available OSO's who are in that orgId SELECT RP.RECRUITING_PERSON_ID, CASE WHEN RP.RANK_CODE IS NOT NULL AND P.LAST_NAME IS NOT NULL AND P.FIRST_NAME IS NOT NULL AND P.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME IS NOT NULL THEN LTRIM(RTRIM(RP.RANK_CODE)) + ' ' + LTRIM(RTRIM(P.LAST_NAME)) + ' ' + LTRIM(RTRIM(P.FIRST_NAME)) + ' ' + LTRIM(RTRIM(P.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME)) WHEN RP.RANK_CODE IS NOT NULL AND P.LAST_NAME IS NOT NULL AND P.FIRST_NAME IS NOT NULL AND P.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME IS NULL THEN LTRIM(RTRIM(RP.RANK_CODE)) + ' ' + LTRIM(RTRIM(P.LAST_NAME)) + ' ' + LTRIM(RTRIM(P.FIRST_NAME)) WHEN RP.RANK_CODE IS NOT NULL AND P.LAST_NAME IS NOT NULL AND P.FIRST_NAME IS NULL THEN LTRIM(RTRIM(RP.RANK_CODE)) + ' ' + LTRIM(RTRIM(P.LAST_NAME)) ELSE LTRIM(RTRIM(RP.RANK_CODE)) END AS NAME FROM RECRUITING_PERSON RP, PERSON P WHERE RP.ORGANIZATION_ID = @Organiza.onID AND RP.RECRUITING_PERSON_ID = P.PERSON_ID AND -- select only recruiters whose TOUR_END_DATE IS NULL RP.TOUR_END_DATE IS NULL
UNION
SELECT RECRUITING_PERSON_ID, NAME FROM #TEMP_RP ORDER BY NAME
DROP TABLE #TEMP_RP SET NOCOUNT OFF
